infos.title: King of Dwarves
infos.like: Drinks, sand bath, smithing, and crafting
infos.dislike: Long conferences, the royal throne, Demons (especially the Dark Dragons)
infos.story: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.
infos.story_: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.

1.name: Collision
1.description: Deals ??? P.DMG and knocks down the enemy for 3 sec. Reduces hit enemy's P.DEF by 50% for 10 sec.

2.name: Headbutt
2.description: Dashes toward the enemy and deals ??? P.DMG, knocking them back. Reduces hit enemies's ATK by 25% and ATK Spd by 200 for 10 sec.

3.name: Earth Incarnate
3.description: Increases own All DEF by ??? and Alll DMG Reduction by 250, heals 15% of own HP and gains Immunity to CC for 15 sec. Thiss effect is irremovable.

4.name: Destroy Armor
4.description: Upon attacking, weakens enemy P.DEF by ??? for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to max 5 times.

4.IV: Per every stack, enemy P.Dodge chance is reduced by 10%.

dark.effect: Cooldown is reduced by 10% per each enemy hit.

light.effect: Deals extra P.DMG equal to 10% of max HP.

dark.effect: Effect changes to a 3 sec Stun to nearby enemies.

light.effect: Deals 1% of Max HP as DMG per sec to nearby enemies.
Enemies with 5 stacks take 1% extra P.DMG based off Max HP per attack.

dark.effect: Upon attack, dispel all positive effects and target receives 20% increased P.DMG for 20 sec. Has a cooldown of 20 sec.
When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance to Stun the target for 2 sec and deal extra DMG worth 10% of own HP.

uw.name: Dragon's Ruins, Atein
uw.description: Upon receiving DMG, increases All DEF of all allies except self by (0) for 3 sec and stacks 1 Dragon Rage upon self. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by (1). Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
uw.story: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrators of the world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and the shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons and Mad Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.

1.name: Mad Dragon Shield Decoration
1.description: [Collision] Reduces the target's CC Resist by 250 and P.Block chance by (0) for 10 sec.
1.story: A golden shield decoration that has the image of a Mad Dragon engraved on it. Dwarf master artisans gave it to King Phillop as a present for his remarkable work in hunting Mad Dragons. Phillop did not put it on his shield as it was a little too fancy to use in combat, but he always carries it as a charm to show his gratitude to the warm-hearted artisans.

2.name: Dwarfish Capricorn Helmet
2.description: [Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by (0) for 10 sec.
2.story: Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet. It is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

3.name: Dwarven Ceremonial Hammer
3.description: [Earth Incarnate] For the duration of the skill, ATK Spd and Crit Chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by (0).
3.story: A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

4.name: Hammer of Titan
4.description: [Destroy Armor] Upon attack, reduces the target's ATK by 20% and each stack reduces its Heal Rate by (0).
4.story: A hammer made of Titanium, the legendary metal forged by giants. It is powerful enough to crush through any legendary weapons and armor. After the Demon War, only 3 of them are known to exist in Orvelia.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
sw.description:
Summons the soul of Dragon's Ruins, Atein for 10 sec. For the duration of the soul, increases own DEF by 60%, and normal attacks deal additional P.DMG equal to 1% of own MAX HP, enhancing own Skills.
[Collision] Deals ??? additional P.DMG to the target and increases P.DMG the target takes by 20% for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Deals additional P.DMG 10% of own HP.
[Earth Incarnate] Upon activation, immediately heals HP equal to 20% own Max HP.

advancement.1: Increases the duration of soul by 5 sec.
advancement.2: Changes the additional P.DMG proportional to Max HP from normal attacks to 2%, and increases DEF Reduction effect of [Destroy Armor] by 50% for the duration of Skill.

sw.story:
Phillop's concern grew each day as the darkness within Atein grew stronger.
While the weapon bore great power made from the remains of tainted souls like the Draconics and Mad Dragons, it also harbored the threat of evil impurities that could possess the mind of its wielder.
Phillop made many attempts to suppress the foul energy of Atein, but they had only served as a temporary band-aid.

Phillop contemplated day and night, wondering what could fully detain the foul energy of Atein. He came to the conclusion that it was the Dwarves that could stop this treacherous energy, as Dwarves were the ones who killed Draconics and Mad Dragons the most. After some thought, Phillop ground the Horn of the First Dwarven King and applied it to Atein.

The result was nothing short of a great success. The evil residues etched in the remains could not help but succumb to the energy of the mighty Dwarven king, and they no longer resisted its master.
With the strongest Dwarf by his side, Phillop had nothing to fear.
Whenever Phillop swung Atein, he could feel the First Dwarven King's hearty laughter and his mighty presence.
